TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 1131
TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F Austin to Sheriff of Colony, 06-07-1825

barker_notes.barker_summary: Subpoena for witness, June 7, 1825. To testify concerning seditious conduct of Buckner.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1131

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Subpoena for witness, June 7, 1825. To testify concerning seditious conduct of Buckner.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Department of Texas*/location_mentioned* *location_mentioned*Jurisdiction of the Colony on the Colorado*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p**location_mentioned*Brasos */location_mentioned*and *location_mentioned*San Jacinto*/location_mentioned*—*/p*
*p*The *person_mentioned*Sheriff of said *location_mentioned*Colony */location_mentioned**/person_mentioned*is hereby commanded in the name of the *location_mentioned*State of Quahuila and Texas*/location_mentioned* to summon *person_mentioned*William Rabb*/person_mentioned*, *person_mentioned*Andrew Rabb*/person_mentioned*, *person_mentioned*Thomas Rabb*/person_mentioned*, *person_mentioned*Joseph Newman*/person_mentioned*, *person_mentioned*Robert Keykendall*/person_mentioned*, *person_mentioned*William Kincheloe*/person_mentioned*,*person_mentioned* Alexander Jackson*/person_mentioned*, *person_mentioned*John Clark*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Eli Hunter*/person_mentioned*, to appear before me at my *location_mentioned*office */location_mentioned*in this place on *date_mentioned n="06-11-1825">Saturday the Eleventh day of this Month*/date_mentioned* between the hours of Ten O Clock of the fore noon and two o clock of the afternoon then and there to give evidence as to any thing they may know relative to the disorderly and Seditious Conduct of *person_mentioned*A. C. Buckner*/person_mentioned*, against the *person_mentioned*Authorities of the Government*/person_mentioned* or the public peace of this *location_mentioned*Colony*/location_mentioned*, and you will make a return of this summons, on *date_mentioned n="06-10-1825">Friday evening the 10 inst*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p*Given in the Town of *location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="06-07-1825">June 7th 1825*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Stephen F. Austin Judge of the Colony*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*To the *person_mentioned*Sheriff of Said Colony*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
